BiomeDef.label: Earth
BiomeDef.description: The original human homeworld. Diverse climates, familiar plants and animals, and a balanced ecosystem. Feels just like home.

BiomeDef.label: Bird World
BiomeDef.description: A planet ruled by intelligent birds. Lush forests, abundant nests, and the constant sound of squawking. Watch out for territorial flocks!

BiomeDef.label: Gear World
BiomeDef.description: A mechanical planet covered in gears, cogs, and metal flora. Life here is part organic, part machine. Expect strange resources and hazards.
